title: Combat Game Male Voice Announcer
description: 602 male announcer phrases for Fighting games, Close Combat, FPS, MOBA etc. Includes 2 versions: with and without an effect.
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Audio preview: Effect | No Effect ||| List of phrases


This pack is part of our Ultimate Announcers Bundle!


This male Announcer voice pack covers everything you need for your next project, whether if it's a fighting game, close combat animation video and more.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 602 files, almost all are unique phrases.
  • The pack is divided into categories for easy access.
  • Includes 2 versions: with and without effects (1204 files), so you may apply any effect you desire to the original files.
  • Top-quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


Categories:


  • Start Round
  • End Round
  • Win
  • Lose/Death
  • Round/Level
  • Attack Description
  • Positive Feedback
  • Negative Feedback
  • Countdown
  • Instructions
  • Announcement
  • Current State
  • Selection
  • One Word
